listitem.para: We updated the bundled JRE which is included in every Jubula installation to Java 1.8.0_66.
Completeness check operations within the ITE, that are supposed to ensure the projects executable consistency, are now performed in the background and do no longer cause the UI from being blocked.

para.emphasis: New view for logs from execute external command

listitem.para:
A new view is introduced which can show the logs from the execute external command action. When selecting such an action in a testresult the log will be shown.
Use Window-->Show View-->Other to open the Log View.

In the test case, test suite and test job editors it is now possible to add a new kind of comment as a node to your test via alt+c. These comments are only visible in the editors and can help you structuring your tests.

para.emphasis: New way to delete test result summaries/details with dbtool

listitem.para: The dbtool can now delete test result summaries/details. It can be used to delete test results for a specific project/version or all projects. You can define an amount of days to remove test result summaries/details that are older than a specific date. For more information see user manual.
